title: Getting Started with C++
summary: A beginner's guide to setting up your environment and writing your first C++ program.
content:
C++ is a powerful general-purpose programming language. It can be used to develop operating systems, browsers, games, and so on. C++ supports different ways of programming like procedural, object-oriented, functional, and so on. This makes C++ powerful as well as flexible.

Setting up the Environment

To start coding in C++, you need a compiler and a text editor. Popular choices include GCC for the compiler and VS Code for the editor.

Hello World

#include <iostream>

int main() {
    std::cout << "Hello, World!";
    return 0;
}

title: Understanding Data Structures
summary: Why data structures are crucial for efficient software development.
content:
Data structures are a way of organizing and storing data so that they can be accessed and worked with efficiently. They define the relationship between the data, and the operations that can be performed on the data.

Common Data Structures

  • Arrays
  • Linked Lists
  • Stacks
  • Queues
  • Trees
  • Graphs

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
summary: Brief overview of ML concepts and how to get started.
content:
Machine Learning is a subset of artificial intelligence (AI) that focuses on building systems that learn, or improve performance, based on the data they consume. Artificial Intelligence is a broad term that refers to systems or machines that mimic human intelligence.

Types of Machine Learning

  • Supervised Learning
  • Unsupervised Learning
  • Reinforcement Learning
